price: Kad mu oni uđoše i rekoše: “Mir vama!” – i on reče: “Mir vama, ljudi neznani!”
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh dakhalū ʿalayhi faqālū salāman qāla salāmun qawmun munkarūna
